function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited access nodes may cause overcrowding at the remaining access points, increasing the risk of disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to overcrowding at access points.","Mitigation":"Implement crowd management measures at the remaining access points, such as queue management and social distancing markers.","Technologies":"Queue management systems, automated crowd counting systems.","People":"General public, visitors to public places.","Owner":"Public venue management, government authorities."},{"Description":"Temporary closure of access points may lead to altered behavior of individuals, potentially increasing the risk of non-compliance with safety measures.","Impact":"Increased risk of non-compliance with safety measures due to altered behavior.","Mitigation":"Implement clear communication of safety guidelines, regular announcements, and visible signage.","Technologies":"Digital signage, public address systems.","People":"General public, visitors to public places.","Owner":"Public venue management, government authorities."},{"Description":"One-way mobility circulation may cause congestion and bottlenecks at entry and exit points, increasing the risk of close contact and disease transmission.","Impact":"Increased risk of disease transmission due to congestion and close contact at entry and exit points.","Mitigation":"Implement staggered entry and exit times, and provide clear signage for one-way circulation routes.","Technologies":"Digital signage, time entry systems.","People":"General public, visitors to public places.","Owner":"Public venue management, government authorities."}]}
